text: Jolbon was the capital city of the ancient Korean Kingdom of Goguryeo.Sin ki- sop. (2004). Korea Annual, p. 18. The city was established in 37BCE by Jumong.Madrolle, Claudius. (1912). Northern China, the Valley of the Blue River, p. 422. ==References == ==Related pages== * Goguryeo Category:Capital of Korea Category:History of Korea Category:30s BC establishments
title: Jolbon
